media_manager.plugins.showmanager.ShowManagerPlugin module¶

class media_manager.plugins.showmanager.ShowManagerPlugin.ShowManagerPlugin[source]¶

Bases: media_manager.plugins.common.GenericPlugin.GenericPlugin

Class that handles the calls to the Show Manager

get_command_name() → str[source]¶
Returns:“batch download”
get_config_tag() → str[source]¶
Returns:“batch-download”
get_name() → str[source]¶
Returns:“Batch Download Manager”
get_parser_arguments()[source]¶
Returns:tuple of two list of dictionaries, consisting of argument tags and descriptions. the first tuple element contains boolean values, the others store string values
start_args_parse(args)[source]¶

Runs the plugin in arg parse mode

start_cli(parent_cli)[source]¶

Starts the CLI of the plugin :param parent_cli: the parent cli :return: void

start_gui(parent_gui: gfworks.templates.gtk3.Gtk3GridTemplate.Gtk3GridTemplate)[source]¶
